label: Usecase
name: Loitering Detection

modelDetails.description: Detects individuals remaining in an area beyond a threshold time with configurable alert management
modelDetails.intended_use: Security monitoring for suspicious loitering behavior in restricted or monitored areas
modelDetails.ethical_considerations: Ensure fair application across all demographic groups and respect privacy regulations

loiteringThresholdSeconds.description: Check if objects remain stationary for longer than the specified loiteringThresholdSeconds

alert_interval.description: To alert every first and at every alert_interval if the object continues to exist, to avoid continuously throwing alerts

severity.description: Severity of the alerts, where 'low' indicates minimal impact or urgency, 'medium' indicates moderate impact requiring attention, and 'high' indicates critical impact requiring immediate action

notes: Essential for security applications. Configurable parameters prevent alert fatigue while maintaining security effectiveness.
